title: Get a write stream
description: Get metadata for an existing write stream in BigQuery, such as its creation time and type.

objective.narrative: Retrieve a write stream's metadata to determine if it is ready for data writes or if it has been committed. This helps manage data ingestion pipelines effectively by allowing applications to inspect a stream's state.

regionTags.name: bigquerystorage_v1beta2_bigquerywrite_writestream_get
regionTags.title: Get a write stream
regionTags.description: Get metadata for an existing write stream in BigQuery, such as its creation time and type.
